Name: VR Sweet Heart
About the game: This game is a casual game. You need to talk to the ladies, understand the needs of the ladies, find the corresponding items in the scene and hand them over to the ladies, you can get the favorability of the character. You can enter the next level only after the current favorability level is full. If you don't like our initial image character, in the third level, players can choose a photo from the photos we prepared to generate a new character according to their own preferences. For a better gaming experience, this game currently only supports the VR version.
